function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Necessity for continuous and automated surveillance to monitor covid-19 symptoms and transmission rates","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Patient data privacy violation through unsecured data sharing","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Loss of data security and privacy in centralized cloud storage for contact tracing data.","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in maintaining a new working environment with social distancing and minimal physical contact.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of secure health record database","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inefficient healthcare management system","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential risk of vaccine information modification","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on blockchain for public surveillance","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misuse or mismanagement of blockchain technology may lead to security breaches or data manipulation, compromising the integrity of the data.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of critical reflections on the importance of cities and how they are governed","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to rally support for transformative actions towards addressing threats like climate change","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of disclosure of competing financial interests or personal relationships","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The pandemic has exposed old socioeconomic inequalities that exist in cities, threatening public health by making it difficult to enforce protective measures such as social distancing.","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Public transportation has been severely affected during the pandemic, leading to increased use of private vehicles as a safer alternative and potentially posing threats to achieving sustainable development.","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Covid-19 pandemic impact on urban areas","category":"Cities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Imbalanced coverage of major impact themes","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in impact and response mechanisms across contexts","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased density enabling transmission of infectious diseases","category":"Cities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited access to resources in peri-urban and suburban areas","category":"Cities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Negative attitudes towards public transport may persist, leading to decreased usage and increased reliance on private vehicles.","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased negative attitudes towards public transportation and preference for individual travel modes","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased investment in suburban developments and reliance on private vehicles","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Detrimental impact on well-being and health due to reduced physical activity and social isolation","category":"Person","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Smart technologies used for top-down pandemic containment","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased reliance on smart city technologies","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decline in tax base of cities encouraging engagement in collaboration networks of cities","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased reliance on smart solutions and icts for urban operations and quality of life governance","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conflicting priorities of different government levels","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited financial resources for city-level governance","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Fragmented governance leading to conflicting priorities in containing virus spread","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited local independence and high reliance on central government for coordination","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Absence of economic and social support for poor, disadvantaged, and vulnerable pandemic","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for ineffective response actions and economic losses in cities","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor and marginalized groups hit harder by the pandemic","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Extreme structures","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decrease in tourism due to pandemic","category":"Cities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Negative impact on hotel industry sense of community in cities","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Neglect of border closure policies by rich urbanites","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Social inequalities and right to housing issues","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequality and inequitable access to services can put the entire city at risk of further diffusion of the virus.","category":"Cities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in social tensions caused by pandemics, leading to stigmatization and mental health problems for migrant communities.","category":"Cities","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Diminishing sense of community in some cities due to the
